Reference

Exported Functions

Functions exported by the Rnssp package

add_rmd_template()

Utility to Add a New RMarkdown Template

alert_ewma()

Exponentially Weighted Moving Average (EWMA)

alert_farrington()

Farrington Temporal Detector

alert_nbinom()

Negative binomial detection algorithm for weekly counts

alert_regression()

Adaptive Multiple Regression

alert_serfling()

Original Serfling method for weekly time series

alert_switch()

Regression/EWMA Switch

askme()

Password Prompt Utility

change_dates()

Utility to Change the Start and/Or End Dates in an ESSENCE API URL

classify_trend()

Trend Classification for Proportions/Percentages

clean_text()

Removes stopwords and common patterns of Chief Complaints

create_profile()

Create a profile with a username and password

create_token_profile()

Create a profile with an API token

get_api_data()

Get API data

get_api_graph()

Get an API graph

get_api_response()

Get API response

get_essence_data()

Get ESSENCE data

list_apps()

List Available Shinyapps

list_templates()

List Available Report Templates

remove_rmd_template()

Utility to Remove an Existing RMarkdown Template

Rnssp

Tools, Functions, Shapefiles data, and Rmarkdown templates to work with Syndromic Surveillance data

Rnssp_vignettes()

Browse Rnssp vignettes

run_app()

Run embedded shiny applications

webscrape_icd()

ICD Code Web Scraper

Exported Classes

Classes exported by the Rnssp package

Credentials

A Credentials Class Representing a Credentials object

NSSPContainer

A NSSPContainer Class to store a value or an object

Token

A Token Class Representing a Token object

Available Datasets

Datasets contained in the Rnssp package

cbsa_sf

US Core-Based Statistical Area Shapefile

county_sf

US Counties Shapefile

hhs_sf

US Health and Human Services Regions Shapefile

hsa_sf

US Hospital Service Area Shapefile

state_sf

US States Shapefile

state_territories_sf

US States and Territories Shapefile

territories_sf

US Territories Shapefile

tribal_sf

US Native American Lands Shapefile

simulated_data

Simulated Time Series data

rnssp_stopwords

Rnssp Stopwords
